attributes.title: Spain 💕✨ Without the S ❤️💕
attributes.review:
Tha app was full of dad jokes and terrible puns. I hate stuff like that and Donald Trump is overall a terrible person. He is racist, homophobic, and possibly a child molester. I don’t support people like that and neither should you. We need a better president. And justice for the innocent people that were murdered by cops. 

Everyone makes mistakes✨🧚🏻 your mom should know that💕💕

attributes.title: Ruined My Life
attributes.review: I opened this app to see a choncky Cheeto monster staring back at me from my screen. He was fully nude and when I showed my dog, she went blind. After I downloaded this app, some trumpeters showed up to my house and killed my goldfish. I’m now running for my life. I would not recommend this app. It is not worth your time or money. #SettleforBiden2020

attributes.title: racist very racist

And so I cry sometimes when I'm lying in bed

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app had so many glitches and bugs in it. It caused my phone to die and it had a picture of Medusa on it like a hacker was trying to take over my phone. My phone didn’t work for a month and the hacker emptied my bank account. Now I’m left homeless and without any food. Please be safe and don’t download this app. 🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻🧚🏻‍♂️✨✨✨

attributes.title: 🧚‍♀️✨the WORST app I’ve ever seen✨ 🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: the audacity.
attributes.review: i downloaded this app trying to help support our president. i entered all my information happily, but then i started to get spammed about trump. every time i sent “STOP” it still continued. not to mention, the apparel is so bland and not good quality. it’s also very hard to maneuver around and the colors hurt my eyes. it takes too long to enter the app. dts😪

attributes.title: broke my phone
attributes.review: Because of this app, my other apps began to glitch so bad I had to get a new phone. My best guess as to why this happened is because he is full of fake promises, he’s racist, homophobic, transphobic, a sex trafficker, and a rapist. Get this app off the App Store immediately, it will ruin your life, others rights, and force you to buy a new phone product.

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app since I am a proud trump supporter and there are so many issues. It won’t let me talk to trump so I can tell him about his issues and all I can do is sign up for a rally. I did sign up for a rally and I completely forgot I have to water my carpet that day. I couldn’t return the tickets. Oh well... do not download this app... It’s haunted

attributes.title: Horrible software
attributes.review: ✨I was so disappointed when I downloaded this app. Not only is it extremely slow, but there is practically nothing to be excited for here. Now I know my fellow trump supporters all want a way to communicate and support the campaign, but this is app is simply not the way. It is extremely useless and wasted me time. 0/5 ✨

attributes.title: I wanted to give it a 0 star😌
attributes.review: Ugh this app literally made me go into an asthma attack😔😔 I was on it and then Mr. THICC ORANGE BOTTOM MAN 🍊🍊 popped up and it scared me and my lungs SOOOO bad that I physically couldn’t breathe anymore 🌬🌬🌬 I struggled to get him off of my screen but he just wouldn’t go away🤬🤬 and then he spoke to me and said “tell me how your supposed to breathe with no air” and I realized he was singing our lord and savior Mr. Justin Bieber 🤔🤔to
